DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine impact bystander intervention education program college student ' attitude behavior associate bystander intervention sexual violence .
DOC.brief_title: Experimentally Testing Effectiveness Campus-based Bystander Intervention
DOC.detailed_description: This study use randomize control trial , longitudinal design determine impact peer education theater intervention undergraduate student attitude behavior related sexual violence bystander intervention . Students assign either experimental group ( receive 3-4 dos intervention ) comparison group ( receive 1 dose ) survey six time 18 month period .
DOC.criteria: Incoming first year student fall semester 2010 Age 18 21 Attended Summer Orientation session Incoming transfer student Younger 18 old 21
